author: jwhitlock
msg: Updated to fix OPENEJB-60, problem with openejb-tests.bat not working properly when passed no arguments

author: jwhitlock
msg: Updated to fix problem in Windows where classpath is wrong for openejb-tests.bat.

author: jwhitlock
msg: Updated to fix problem in Windows with ejb-jar.xml not being found in beans.

author: dain
msg: Changed orb reference in the EJB protocol to a collection reference so it can be optional.  This allows us to split out the CORBA configuration from the main server.

author: jtolentino
msg: Updated script to conform directory structure with Maven 2 standards. Conformed artifact naming with Maven 2 standards. Removed transitive dependencies. Created additional POMs for submodules. New batch file for devs running Windows.
